description:
This table contains the allowed amount adjudication levels for AP Claim procedures.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALLOW_AMT_ADJ_LVLS
columns.description: The allowed amount adjudication levels for the procedure. Information from this caret (^) delimited string is parsed out in subsequent columns.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_PMT_LV
columns.description: The level of payment for the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_CVD
columns.description: The covered amount of the allowed amount for the service line of the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_LM_TYP
columns.description: The limit type of the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_PMT_MECH
columns.description: The payment mechanism for the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_PRICE
columns.description: The price of the service line allowed amount on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_RATE
columns.description: The rate used in determining the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_HMU
columns.description: The conversion factor table used to price a service line using RVU pricing.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_HMU_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: The name for the conversion factor table.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_TOS
columns.description: The type of service used to get the conversion factor in Relative Value Unit (RVU) pricing.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_UNITS
columns.description: The total number of time units used to determine the price of an anesthesia procedure on an AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_DSCNT
columns.description: Discount percentage used in calculating the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_MULT
columns.description: The multiplier or conversion factor value used in calculating the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_RVU_VALUE
columns.description: The Relative Value Unit (RVU) value of the procedure on the service line of the AP Claim. This is only stored in level 1.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LPP_CMMT
columns.description: The comment added by the pricing programming point, which was used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_FSM
columns.description: The ID of the fee schedule map used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_FSM_FEE_SCHEDULE_MAP_NAME
columns.description: The name for the fee schedule map record.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_ZIP
columns.description: When a fee schedule map is used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP claim, this column contains the ZIP Code where the service was performed.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_UNSUPP_LPP_YN
columns.description: Set to "Y" if the pricing programming point is not supported, resulting in the execution of the pricing programming point being skipped. Set to "N" otherwise.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_FEE_SCHED1_PRICE
columns.description: The rate associated with the first fee schedule used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_FEE_SCHED2_PRICE
columns.description: The rate associated with the second fee schedule used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_SVC_PAYMENT_MECH_C
columns.description: The payment mechanism used as a result of either minimum of options or maximum of options to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_LVL_IS_STOP_LOSS_YN
columns.description: Set to "Y" if the level of payment for the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim is a stop loss level, "N" otherwise.
